Name: Battle Imagine - Shadow Captain
Description:
Activates or advances Shadow Captain's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Electro Bomb.

Stunt! Electro Bomb
Transforms into Elite: Shadow Captain and fires an Electro Bomb at the target, causing AoE Attack Damage and silencing the target.
Upon the skill cast, the DMG dealt and healing of your Expertise Skill are increased for a period.
Description2: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
